metadata.Title: CVE-2019-13111 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: A WebPImage::decodeChunks integer overflow in Exiv2 through 0.27.1 allowsan attacker to cause a denial of service (large heap allocation followed bya very long running loop) via a crafted WEBP image file.

criterions.comment: exiv2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
